titleInfo.title: Data publication: The sphaleron rate from Euclidean lattice correlators: an exploration

mods.abstract:
Data publication for "The sphaleron rate from Euclidean lattice correlators: an exploration",
[arXiv:2012.08279](https://arxiv.org/abs/2012.08279). Contains plot scripts and data shown in figures.
